original_text: When the people of Israel left Egypt, they carried with them the dead bodies of Joseph and his family. They took them back to Shechem and they buried them in a hole for dead people there. Abraham had bought that ground in Shechem from the family of a man called Hamor. He had paid Hamor the right money for it.’
korean_text: 세겜으로 옮겨져 아브라함이 세겜 하몰의 자손에게서 은으로 값 주고 산 무덤에 장사되니라

sentences.original_text: When the people of Israel left Egypt
they carried with them the dead bodies
They took them back to Shechem
and they buried them in a hole for dead people there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳의 사람 시신을 위한 구멍에 그들을 묻었습니다

sentences.original_text: Abraham had bought that ground in Shechem
from the family of a man called Hamor
He had paid Hamor the right money for it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것에 대해 하모에게 적정한 돈을 지불했습니다
